Explanation of the project

For a course during my exchange in Finland we needed to make an application in group with whatever programming language you felt comfortable with.

I made my application in collaboration with my roommate Michiel Van Eynde. When we were searching for app idea's to build, we couldn't find an app that made you rate our drinks we encountered during our stay so the decision was pretty easy.
